title: Introducing: Marie Naffah
content:
Photo: Marie Naffah – RTW Films Photograph

Powerful voice, honest (witty) lyrics and on-the-edge-of-your-seat mash ups.

Tick, tick, tick. 21 year old Marie Naffah has got it all under her large (metaphorical) belt. Despite the juxtaposition between her gentle guitar riffs and vocals they tie together seamlessly well, particularly in the catchy Primrose Hill.

All things considered it seems pretty unsurprising that just last week she was nominated for MTV’s “Young Unsigned Artist” of 2014, which may help her get some well-deserved attention. Waiting eagerly to see what Marie’s up to in the future but in the meantime, check out her Big Love/Lose Yourself/Sweet Dreams/Kids Mash Up.
